guide.title: Gnome 2.20 Upgrade Guide
guide.abstract: This is a guide for upgrading from GNOME 2.18.x to GNOME 2.20.x.

body.p: The Font, Theme, and Background preferneces capplets have been merged into the "Appearance" capplet. This means that changing almost anything related to the appearance of your desktop is now done in a single capplet. Go to System -> Preferences -> Appearance to change these settings.

Evolution now has a real choice of spam filters. It comes built in with plugins for Spamassassin and Bogofilter, and can choose which one to use at runtime. The USE flags for choosing are now gone. To choose a spam plugin, go to Preferences -> Mail Preferences -> Junk and set the Default junk plugin from the drop box. It will tell you if you have the correct programs installed. If you only have one of Spamassassin and Bogofilter installed, it will choose that one by default. If you have both, it defaults to Spamassassin.

section.title: Gnome Power Manager Tray icon missing (fixed)

body.p: The problem with gnome-power-manager's tray icon being missing on startup has been fixed. If you had any automatic workarounds in place, you should remove them after upgrading.
